Author: Icanmakeyouhappy
Text: You sound near enough identical to me! I follow so many body posi people ..Iâ€™m a joke ğŸ˜­. One half tells me to love my body and accept it. The other half is chastising it.   Thereâ€™s two of me. And right now, the latter is winning. By society and my own understanding skinny me is prettier and more worthy of life. Period.

Author: zombeezinthetrap
Text: [This reminds me of this video I watched. ](https://twitter.com/skinnyybrat/status/1080011491884101634?s=21)  itâ€™s so hard not to be disordered when so many compliment what it does to us physically.
